mean_cn: adj. 苦行的；  n. 苦行者
mean_en: relating to or having a strict and simple way of living that avoids physical pleasure
sentence: He lived an ascetic lifestyle, eating simply and meditating most of the time.
sentence_trans: 他过着禁欲的生活，吃得简单，大多数时候都在冥想。
word_etyma: ascet练习 ＋ ic形容词，...的 → 练习苦行 → ascetic苦行的
